columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the detector.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The timestamp of when the detector was created.

columns.name: finding_publishing_frequency
columns.description: The publishing frequency of the finding.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The last-updated timestamp for the detector.

columns.name: data_sources
columns.description: Describes which data sources are enabled for the detector.

columns.name: features
columns.description: Describes the features that have been enabled for the detector.

columns.name: master_account
columns.description: Contains information about the administrator account and invitation.
